summary: Veterans Affairs is in the process of replacing its IT system used to maintain veterans' health records—and has deployed its new system to a few locations. We testified that the new system has presented issues for some users. For example, many users said that they weren't adequately trained to use the new system. Users also said that the new system had decreased morale and job...
title: Electronic Health Record Modernization: VA Needs to Address Change Management Challenges, User Satisfaction, and System Issues
